title: Why can't I log in
body: I can't log into my account through client. My password is absolutely correct.

replies.body: I would suggest changing the region on your patcher to something different and then changing it back to normal. Once that's done it should start downloading a  patch which when finished should let you sign in again. Let me know if it still won't let you in though!
i did a Full Repair of the client now it works, i'm in!!! {{summoner:12}} back in!! :D
me too F this, i want to play now because its the only time in the day i can play. F this for real! {{summoner:4}} outta here

Exactly and no answer
I even went to reset and no email. WTF IS WRONG WITH RIOT
